official_title: Effects of Animal-Assisted Interactions (AAI) on Quality of Life in Children With Life-Threatening Conditions and Their Parents
inclusion_criteria:
* Children 3-17 years old
* Confirmed diagnosis of relapsed or refractory cancer
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 3 Years
Must have maximum age of 17 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Reported fear or anxiety of dogs (child or parent)
